PersonalStatement.text: Danielle Harris, born on 1963-10-20, is a Female based in Williamsmouth, Malta. She is Single and holds Emirati nationality. Currently working at Potter and Sons.

WorkExperience.text: Marketing Specialist at Villegas-Barnes from 2011 to 2018.
Senior Systems Administrator at Potter and Sons, 2021 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from Colorado School of Mines
Master's in Engineering from KTH Royal Institute of Technology

PersonalSkills.text: Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys playing tennis.
